title: Methods Basics - Define, Parameters & Return Values
description: Master defining simple methods, adding parameters to customize behavior, and returning values from methods.
learningObjectives: Understand method anatomy (return type, name, parameters, body)
Create void methods that print output
Create methods with parameters to customize behavior
Implement methods that return values (int, boolean, String)
Distinguish between void and value-returning methods
Call methods from main and use returned values
